items.text: length ball outside off and he goes back to punch this to long off
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, 1 run

items.text: tossed up on off, tapped back and the bowler tumbles to field
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Chase, no run

items.text: loud appeal but not given. The bowler's won that round though, with one that dipped on the batsman and straightened. He had no clue about it, struck on the pads but a bit high
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Chase, no run

items.text: full on middle and off, driven along the ground to long-off
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, 1 run

items.text: good length on middle and leg, turning across him, he goes well back and punches to midwicket
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Chase, 1 run

items.text: full on the stumps, driven back confidently, but the bowler gets a hand to it to his left
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, no run

items.text: goes deep in his crease to whip this with his wrists to midwicket and raise 2000 ODI runs. It's his 51st match
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, 1 run
Shakib Al Hasan to Chase, 1 run
Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, no run

items.text: full ball on the stumps, driven to long off
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Chase, 1 run
Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, no run
Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, no run
Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, no run

items.preText: Shai Hope taking only 47 innings to 2000 runs sets a new record for West Indies. Even the great Viv Richards took 48, and Hope has bettered that mark.
items.text: oh he got lucky! down the track and he wanted to swing it over midwicket but it takes an outside edge that goes past the keeper for four
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, FOUR runs

items.text: fuller on the stumps, carefully patted into the legside off the front foot
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, no run

items.text: full on the pads, clipped to deep midwicket
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Chase, 1 run

items.text: fuller, almost yorker length, pushed to midwicket
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, no run

items.text: stands tall in his crease to punch this length ball to long-on
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, 1 run

items.text: hurries on to him a bit and the keeper likes it, but Chase is equal to it, and pushes it down the ground to long-off
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Chase, 1 run

items.text: mis-field by cover allows a single. Confident stride out and he drives crisply, but straight to Mehidy. He lets it through though
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, 1 run
Shakib Al Hasan to Chase, no run

items.text: goes on the back foot to this but it's not short enough and he just wants to defend it, but it takes the outside edge to roll towards point
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, 1 run
Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Chase, 1 run

items.text: length ball on off, he goes back to whip it through the legside but gets it off the top of the bat and it rolls back to the bowler
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, no run

items.text: quick single taken with a tap into the legside, they make it easily with the fielder fumbling
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, 1 run
